metadata.title: CVE-2022-45885 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel through 6.0.9.drivers/media/dvb-core/dvb_frontend.c has a race condition that can cause ause-after-free when a device is disconnected.

criterions.comment: linux package in focal is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023.09.01').
linux-hwe-5.8: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by linux-hwe-5.11').
